This phrase connects Jews collectively to negative actions and crimes, as seen in point 7 and 8 of the JDA guidelines. By associating Jews with harmful stereotypes and criminal behavior, the tweet targets them based on their identity, fitting the definition of antisemitism as discrimination against Jews as Jews. The use of derogatory language and baseless accusations of crimes further solidifies this conclusion.
